      LeetCode 443: String Compression í’€ì´

      ğŸ“Š ê²°ê³¼

      • ì†Œìš”ì‹œê°„: 2ì‹œê°„
      • Runtime: 1ms
      • Memory: 44.09MB

      ğŸ’» ë‚´ ì½”ë“œ

      class Solution {
    public int compress(char[] chars) {
        char current = chars[0];
        int count = 1;
        int p = 1;
        
        for (int i = 1; i < chars.length; i++) {
            if (chars[i] == chars[i-1]) {
                count++;
            } else {
                current = chars[i];             
                if (count == 1) {
                    chars[p] = current;
                    p++;
                    continue;
                } else {
                    char[] countChar = String.valueOf(count).toCharArray();
                    for (char c : countChar) {
                        chars[p] = c;    
                        p++;
                    }
                    chars[p] = current;
                    p++;
                }
                count = 1;
            }
        }

        if (count != 1) {
            char[] countChar = String.valueOf(count).toCharArray();
            int j = 0;
            for (char c : countChar) {
                chars[p] = c;    
                p++;
            }            
        }
        
        return p;
    }
}

      class Solution {
    public int compress(char[] chars) {
        int write = 0;  // ì“°ê¸° ìœ„ì¹˜
        int i = 0;      // ì½ê¸° ìœ„ì¹˜
        
        while (i < chars.length) {
            char current = chars[i];
            int count = 0;
            
            // ê°™ì€ ë¬¸ì ê°œìˆ˜ ì„¸ê¸°
            while (i < chars.length && chars[i] == current) {
                i++;
                count++;
            }
            
            // ë¬¸ì ì“°ê¸°
            chars[write++] = current;
            
            // ê°œìˆ˜ê°€ 2 ì´ìƒì´ë©´ ìˆ«ì ì“°ê¸°
            if (count > 1) {
                for (char c : String.valueOf(count).toCharArray()) {
                    chars[write++] = c;
                }
            }
        }
        
        return write;
    }
}

      ë°©ë²• 2: ë” ê°„ê²°í•œ ë²„ì „

      class Solution {
    public int compress(char[] chars) {
        int write = 0;
        
        for (int read = 0; read < chars.length; ) {
            char current = chars[read];
            int count = 0;
            
            while (read < chars.length && chars[read] == current) {
                read++;
                count++;
            }
            
            chars[write++] = current;
            
            if (count > 1) {
                for (char c : Integer.toString(count).toCharArray()) {
                    chars[write++] = c;
                }
            }
        }
        
        return write;
    }
}

      1. Two Pointer íŒ¨í„´

      Run-Length Encoding (RLE)

      ì…ë ¥: ['a','a','b','b','c','c','c']
ê³¼ì •: a(2), b(2), c(3)
ì¶œë ¥: ['a','2','b','2','c','3']

      ğŸ¯ ê°œì„  í›„ ì½”ë“œ

      class Solution {
    public int compress(char[] chars) {
        int write = 0;
        int read = 0;
        
        while (read < chars.length) {
            char current = chars[read];
            int count = 0;
            
            // ê°™ì€ ë¬¸ì ê°œìˆ˜ ì„¸ê¸°
            while (read < chars.length && chars[read] == current) {
                read++;
                count++;
            }
            
            // ë¬¸ì ì“°ê¸°
            chars[write++] = current;
            
            // ê°œìˆ˜ê°€ 2 ì´ìƒì´ë©´ ìˆ«ì ì“°ê¸°
            if (count > 1) {
                for (char c : String.valueOf(count).toCharArray()) {
                    chars[write++] = c;
                }
            }
        }
        
        return write;
    }
}

      Run-Length Encoding (RLE)

      • ì—°ì†ëœ ë°ì´í„°ë¥¼ ì••ì¶•í•˜ëŠ” ê¸°ë²•
